### locality exercise (3) {.smaller}

```c
struct Student {
    char name[128]; long id; float grade;
};
struct Student students[1000];

float averageGrade() {
    float sum = 0.0
    for (int i = 0; i < 1000; i += 1)
        sum += students[i].grade;
    return sum / 1000.0;
}
```
